metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0840 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description: Multiple stack-based buffer underflows in decoder/ih264d_parse_cavlc.c in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-04-01 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 26399350.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Abhishek Arya, Oliver Chang, and Martin Barbella

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
